text_paragraphs: Information Note on the Court’s case-law 16
Length of criminal proceedings which the applicant joined as a civil party: violation

The case concerns the length of criminal proceedings which the applicant joined as a civil party in June 1985. The proceedings ended, in respect of the civil claim, in January 1998 and therefore lasted 12 years, 7 months and 2 days.
Article 41: The Court awarded the applicant 30,000 francs (FRF) in respect of non-pecuniary damage. It also made an award in respect of costs.
